title: Upgrading my PC
body:
I will just start off by saying I have little to no knowledge about the technicalities of PC's, the only thing I know is my current PC has the worst CPU known to man. I just wanna hear the parts people have in their PC that allow them to run graphically intense games at max resolution at 60+ FPS. Prices are irrelevant, I have a lot to spend.

I don't know if threads of misc. have to be league of legends related sooooooooooooo

nerf lee sin I guess

replies.body: also dude, as thurst said, if you even give people a budget to work with, a lot of nice people exist on forums around the place, i had a guy build my first pc for me, didnt even know the dude, he found me cheap parts and got me free shipping just cuz he's a fucking legend. have a look around ;)

http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/ (Look under Computers heading for Desktops)

You want information about a decent desktop, whirlpool is your answer. A lot of people will help contribute if you give them something to work with. For eg, a price range, games you play, whether or not you need peripherals etc. Every detail helps!

60+ fps.. k man pls.. gonna send you a little link, just browse the possible builds in the forums... 60fps these days is a joke, have a look, this site also has "budget builds" AND builds you could easily fork out 5k for.

http://www.tomshardware.com/

http://pccasegear.com/
